text:
@dbongino @karensfirmitup This guy here, just tweets and runs back down his rabbit hole 🕳.....

👉🏼Cancer vs coronavirus 
👉🏼Forest fire vs coronavirus
What’s’more damaging?

America leads the world in coronavirus cases....
But the art of distraction 
Both #MAGA and #Trump got that down pat...
